alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Montgomery and southern Chautauqua Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 616 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Paul to 7 miles east of Cedar Vale. Movement was south at 10 mph. Strong winds will be possible well ahead of precipitation, along a southward moving outflow boundary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coffeyville, Caney, Dearing, Tyro, Peru, Liberty, Chautauqua, Havana, Elgin, Bolton, Niotaze, Independence Airport and Coffeyville Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southeastern Kansas.
